questions.question: What is the overall shape of the container holding the product?
What is the predominant color of the product's label?
What is the primary material of the container itself?
What is the texture of the label's surface, based on visual observation?
Is there any apparent embossing or debossing on the container?
What is the style of the font used on the product's label?
What is the color of the text on the label?
Are there any visible images or graphics on the label besides text?
Does the container have a cap or lid, and if so, what type?
What is the approximate size of the text on the label, relative to the overall container?
What is the overall visual impression of the product's labeling style?
Considering the label's information, what is the listed primary ingredient?
Are there any visible warnings or symbols present on the packaging?
Does the label use any specific design elements to highlight key information?
What is the apparent level of fill within the container?
